sentences.sContent: The bonfire blazed away for hours.
sentences.sCn: 营火继续燃烧了几个钟头

sentences.sContent: A woman throws an object into a bonfire on a beach in Malaga, southern Spain.
sentences.sContent_eng: A woman throws an object into a bonfire on a beach in Malaga, southern Spain.
sentences.sCn: 在西班牙南部的马拉噶镇，一个女人把一个东西投入篝火中。

sentences.sContent: One of them told me this: "When you write, you light a bonfire in the spirit world.
sentences.sContent_eng: One of them told me this: "When you write, you light a bonfire in the spirit world.
sentences.sCn: 其中一个人这样对我说：当你写的时候，你点燃了一簇精神世界的篝火。

trans.tranOther: a large outdoor fire, either for burning waste or for a party
